## Join Us

If you are interested in butterfly and moth evolutionary dynamics in Europe or elsewhere, you are welcome to join us.
To join please complete [**this questionnaire**](https://docs.google.com/forms/d/e/1FAIpQLSdhu3VqpKnXtL7hd1QiRwVnZVfOH3ZXycKbY_QI1MVdT8vtCQ/viewform). This will collect your email, location, question and species interests, how you want to contribute to LepEU, etc.
Once completed, a confirmation email will be sent to you. Only then you have been registered properly.
